name: Maleficent
recipe:
Tall Glass
 2 oz Malibu
 1 oz Blue Curacao
 1.5 oz Pineapple Juice
 2oz Sprite
 Top With Grenadine
 Garnish with Orange

name: Bloody Mary
recipe:
Margherita Glass
 2 oz Vodka
 4-6 oz Blood Mary Mix
 Garnishes: Lemon, Lime, Beef Stick,
 Olive Spear, Pickle, Celery Seed, Asparagus

name: Sweet Poison
recipe:
Short Glass (10 oz)
Build
 1.5 oz Malibu
 1 oz Blue Curacao
 Fill With Pineapple Juice
 Garnish with Lemon and Cherry
